title: Riot please fix your banning system
body: Banned for getting for getting lane stolen? Please explain to me how this is even fair in any sense. This Yasuo player had a cry about not getting 2 of his positions so comes into my lane and starts taking all the cs, essentially stealing in. I at least stay in lane to get xp and buy items and start roaming around the map. But apparently i get banned after the game and get put on leaverbuster. Please fix this so i dont have to play with toxic players. Im almost at the point where im going to stop playing this game due to all the problems regarding players being unsportsmanlike and toxic when things dont go their way. Please fix this.

replies.body:
You were probably banned for your name. Everyone knows Lord* Durant is king now. 

Seriously though, it sounds like something else went on in your game, especially if you had leaver buster put on. So, I'm thinking you went afk. You're only punished for your chat and actions, no one else's. 

Did you get a reform card when logging in or something sent to your email?

A employee works for 8 hours a day. That would mean, you need 31250 employees a day to don't get a back load ....

hmm.. how can you get banned and know that you have a leaver buster ?

Are you sure you aren't confusing the word "ban" with "punished" ?

If you were punished by leaver buster, then I'll let you know that clicking around the map and not doing anything counts as being AFK

The leavebuster system automatically detects afk behavior. It is separate from the IFS (instant feedback system), which is the thing that hands out chat restrictions and bans.

The leavebuster also doesn't take effect after just a single instance of going AFK, it comes into effect only after a pattern has been shown. 

But, take heart, the low priority que isn't part of the punishment ladder, and does not increase other punishments.
There is more to this story and it's about what you told that guy.
